  • torchnlp.text_encoders.word_encoder

Source code for torchnlp.text_encoders.word_encoder

from torchnlp.text_encoders.static_tokenizer_encoder import StaticTokenizerEncoder



[docs]class WordEncoder(StaticTokenizerEncoder):
    """ Split a string by spaces """


[docs]    def decode(self, tensor):
        tokens = [self.itos[index] for index in tensor]

        return ' '.join(tokens)
